snippet: Ryan Hunter-Reay, who lost three rides in three years, all before age 25, is now driving for the former racer Michael Andretti.
abstract: Profile of IndyCar driver Ryan Hunter-Reay, who has a chance to win the IndyCar championship in the season finale.
lead_paragraph: Ryan Hunter-Reay, who lost three rides in three years, all before age 25, is now driving for the former racer Michael Andretti.

headline.seo: Hunter-Reay, Once a Vagabond Driver, Could Win IndyCar Title
headline.main: Once a Vagabond Driver, Now an IndyCar Title Contender
headline.print_headline: Once a Vagabond Driver, Now an IndyCar Title Contender
